translations: n.（原指投入5分钱便会演奏的）自动点唱机；门票为5分钱的电影院

sentences.sentence: The popularity of one reelers shown between live vaudeville acts had grown so quickly that by 1908, there were already 10,000 nickelodeons throughout the country desperate for product.
sentences.translation: 到了1908年，在现场歌舞秀之间放映的电影短片的欢迎度已经增长的如此迅速，已有一万个遍布全国的五分钱戏院急切的需要作品。
